source_sentence: 佛說八部佛名經
translation: Foshuo fangfu foming jing

source_sentence: 元魏天竺婆羅門瞿曇般若流支譯
translation: Yuan wei Tianzhushu brahman Gautama prajñāruci translates

source_sentence: 聞如是：一時，佛遊維耶離奈女樹園，與大比丘眾俱，比丘千二百五十、諸菩薩無央數。
translation: Thus I have heard: One time, when the Buddha was staying at Vaiśālī’s woman’s grove in Vaiśālī, accompanied by a great assembly of monks, one thousand two hundred and fifty bhik

source_sentence: 爾時，有長者子，名曰善作，從城中出，詣奈女園，到世尊所，稽首足下，
translation: At that time there was an elderly man named Sudarśana, a son of the wealthy householder, who came out of the city and went to Naiṣṭha’s pleasure grove.

source_sentence: 右遶三匝，却住一面，叉手白佛：「欲有所問，大聖見聽，乃敢自陳。」
translation: He circumambulated the Buddha three times to his right, stood to one side, saluted him with palms joined, and said to the Buddha, If you want to ask a question, the great sage who sees and hears it will dare to tell it himself

source_sentence: 佛告善作：「恣所欲問，如來當具分別解說。」
translation: The Buddha told Shancheng, As long as he wants to ask questions, the Tathāgata will explain them in detail.

source_sentence: 善作見聽，便白佛言：「唯天中天，寧有諸佛修行本願自致正覺，今現世講說經道？
translation: Seeing and listening well-constructed, he said to the Buddha, Only gods among gods would there be buddhas who cultivate their original vows and attain right awakening on their own, and now teach the sūtras and paths in the present

source_sentence: 大聖願宣諸佛之名，聞之執持，戴著頂上，諮受所說，稽首歸命，頒宣功勳，
translation: The Great Sage, wishing to proclaim the names of the Buddhas, hears and holds them. He carries them on his head, receives what they teach, bows his head in homage, and proclaims their virtues.

source_sentence: 無復眾難，不趣三塗，聞諸佛名，人若非人不得其便，若在縣官，說諸佛名，
translation: They hear the names of the Buddhas without any difficulty and do not proceed to the three realms of rebirth. People, whether human or nonhuman, will not be able to get an advantage over them. If they are in a magistrate’s office, they

source_sentence: 無能撗枉奪其所有，而性堅強，不懷怯弱，安隱得勝，又入戰鬪，刀不傷身，
translation: They cannot covet or steal what belongs to others. They are strong by nature and not faint-hearted. They are peaceful and victorious, and they also enter battle without being harmed by a sword.

source_sentence: 箭射不入，閱叉諸鬼、諸天龍神無敢嬈者，師子、虎狼、野獸、弊蟲無能害者。」
translation: An arrow doesn't go in, and the yakṣas, ghosts, gods, dragons, tigers, wolves, wild animals, and bad insects don't dare to harm it.

source_sentence: 佛告善作：「諦聽！
translation: The Buddha told Shancheng, Listen closely!

source_sentence: 善思念之！
translation: Consider it well!

source_sentence: 當為汝說，擁護除難，無恐獲安。」
translation: I will explain it for you, embrace and remove your difficulties, and there's no fear of gaining peace.

source_sentence: 於是善作受教而聽。
translation: He then skillfully did so, accepted the teaching, and listened.

source_sentence: 佛言：「東方去此，有佛號奉至誠如來、至真、等正覺，今現在說經法，
translation: The Buddha said: To the east of here there is a buddha named Bhīkṣusarabuddha, Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One, who teaches the Dharma of the scriptures now.

source_sentence: 世界曰名聞跡。
translation: The world is called the trace of fame and hearing.

source_sentence: 「復次，東方有佛號固進度思吉義如來、至真、等正覺，今現在說經法，
translation: “Furthermore, in the eastern direction there is a buddha named Sadāparibhūtarstisaṃ吉義如來, who is Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One. He teaches the Dharma of the scriptures

source_sentence: 世界曰莫能當。
translation: The world said, Nothing can be done.

source_sentence: 「復次，東方去此佛土，有佛號觀明功勳如來、至真、等正覺，今現在說經法，
translation: “Furthermore, to the east of this buddha-land there is a buddha named Avalokiteśvaraguṇakṣema Tathāgata, who is now teaching the Dharma of the scriptures.

source_sentence: 世界名吉安。
translation: The world is called Jian.

source_sentence: 「復次，東方去此佛土，有佛號慈英寂首如來、至真、等正覺，今現在說經法，
translation: “Furthermore, to the east of this buddha-land there is a buddha named Maitreya—the Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One, who is now expounding the teachings of the scriptures.

source_sentence: 世界曰無恚恨。
translation: The world is called the absence of anger.

source_sentence: 「復次，東方去此佛土，有佛號真性上首如來、至真、等正覺，今現在說經法，
translation: “Furthermore, to the east of this buddha-land there is a buddha named Supremely Enlightened Tathāgata, Arhat, Completely Enlightened One, who is now expounding the teachings of the scriptures

source_sentence: 世界名曰去杖。
translation: The world is called Going Down with a杖.

source_sentence: 「復次，東方去此佛土，有佛號念眾生稱上首如來、至真、等正覺，今現在說經法，
translation: “Furthermore, to the east of this buddha-land there was a buddha named Supreme Tathāgata, Arhat, Completely Enlightened One.

source_sentence: 世界曰熾盛首。
translation: The world is called the blazing head.

source_sentence: 「復次，東方有佛號踊首高超須彌如來、至真、等正覺，今現在說經法，
translation: “Furthermore, in the eastern direction there is a buddha named Yangshou Gaochaosumeru Tathāgata, who is supremely true and perfectly enlightened. Now he teaches the Dharma of the scriptures.

source_sentence: 世界曰曜赫熱首。
translation: The world is called the hot head of Yaohe.

source_sentence: 「復次，東方去此佛土，有佛號勝恥稱上首如來、至真、等正覺，今現在說經法，
translation: “Furthermore, to the east of this buddha-land there is a buddha named Supremely Embarrassed Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One, who teaches the Dharma of the scriptures.

source_sentence: 世界曰愛樂。
translation: The world is called craving and pleasure.

source_sentence: 「假使有人遙聞東方諸如來號，受此諸佛世尊之名，諦奉善思抱在心懷，
translation: “Suppose someone hears the names of these buddhas from afar and receives the names of these buddhas as world-honored ones, wholeheartedly embracing them with good thoughts in their hearts.

source_sentence: 持諷誦讀，縱使諸佛戒德智慧道本平等；
translation: They preserve and recite it, even to the extent that all buddhas’ morality, virtue, wisdom, and path of enlightenment are equal.

source_sentence: 又諸剎土莊嚴清淨殊異之德，卓然無侶，無有塵垢，無有女人污穢之難，
translation: Furthermore, all the buddha-lands are adorned with pure and extraordinary virtues, distinguished without companions, without dust or dirt, without the difficulty of being defiled by women.

source_sentence: 亦無五濁勤苦之患，三塗之厄，無沙礫石荊棘溝坑。」
translation: Nor is there the trouble of the five turbid and painful afflictions, nor the trouble of the three destinies, nor sand, gravel, stones, thorns, or ditches.

source_sentence: 佛言：「善作！
translation: The Buddha said, Well done!

source_sentence: 若有能持奉是諸佛世尊之名，頒宣遠近，上夜覺寤而起經行，歎詠誦說此諸佛名，
translation: If there are any who can preserve these names of the buddhas, the world-honored ones, and proclaim them far and near, then at dawn on the night before dawn they will begin to recite the names of those buddhas.

source_sentence: 中夜後夜起一心住，捨此無益，念所增修，如是行者，德行日進，終無損耗也。」
translation: Late in the middle of the night and late at night, he arises with a single mind and abides, abandons this uselessness, and increases his mindfulness and cultivates it; such a practitioner's virtuous practice advances day by day without

source_sentence: 佛告善作：「汝當樂此八佛名經，佛以斯法教族姓子，懷抱在心勿得忘捨，
translation: The Buddha said to Śaṅgālī, “You should take delight in these sutras on the names of the eight buddhas. By means of these teachings you should embrace them in your minds and not forget them.

source_sentence: 尋時精修便當逮見八千諸佛。」
translation: When he searches for it, he'll skillfully see 8,000 buddhas.

source_sentence: 善作於是聞聖教詔，則以寶華價直八千兩金，供散世尊，稽首佛足，右遶三匝，
translation: Then Sudhana heard the instruction of the holy decree. He offered the World-honored One jeweled flowers worth eight thousand taels of gold, bowed his head at the Buddha’s feet and circumambulated him three times to his right.

source_sentence: 却行而坐。
translation: Instead, he walks and sits.

source_sentence: 時天帝釋在於彼會，前白佛言：「唯然大聖！
translation: Śakra Devānām-Indra then stayed at that assembly and said to the Buddha, Yes, Great Sage!

source_sentence: 我已受此八佛之名，以諷誦讀抱在心懷。
translation: Having received the names of these eight buddhas, I recite and recite them in my heart.

source_sentence: 唯天中天，吾身當勤精進奉行是八部場諸佛尊名，思惟專念不離食息，
translation: Only gods among gods, I myself should diligently apply myself to honoring these names of the buddhas of the eightfold assembly.

source_sentence: 貴重恭敬為無上寶。」
translation: They're valued and respected as the unsurpassed treasure.

source_sentence: 佛告天帝：「以是之故，天、阿須倫共戰鬪時，若有恐懼，拘翼當念可無所畏。
translation: The Buddha told Indra, For this reason, when the gods and asuras fight together, if they're frightened, their fetters will think that they have nothing to fear.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 假使有人讚歎稱譽諸如來名八部經典，則為頒告無所畏業；
translation: Suppose someone praises and extols the names of the eight kinds of scriptures of the enlightened ones, then they will proclaim fearless action.

source_sentence: 宣諸如來經典名者，不遇惱熱眾患之難；
translation: Those who proclaim the names of all the scriptures of the buddhas will not experience any distress, fever, or difficulty.

source_sentence: 若能顯傳諸如來名經典之要，則宣太平豐熟之世；
translation: If one can reveal and transmit the essentials of the scriptural names of the buddhas, they will proclaim peace and prosperity in the world.

source_sentence: 能傳諸佛經典名者，則宣安隱除去大患；
translation: Those who are able to transmit the names of buddha-scriptures will proclaim peace and remove great dangers.

source_sentence: 能傳諸佛經典名者，則為宣布寂然燕坐；
translation: Those who were able to transmit the names of the scriptures of the Buddhas sat quietly and quietly, proclaiming their names.

source_sentence: 若傳諸佛經典名者，則離一切無數恐懼；
translation: If one transmits the names of buddha-scriptures, they will be freed from all countless fears.

source_sentence: 若能傳此諸佛名經，夢安覺歡，不畏縣官，水火盜賊，怨家債主自然避去，
translation: If they can transmit the names of these buddhas’ scriptures, they will be peaceful and awake in their dreams. They won’t fear the officials of the prefectures, water, fire, thieves, enemies, or debtors who

source_sentence: 鬼神、羅剎、妖魅、魍魎、薜荔、厭鬼皆不敢當；
translation: None of the spirits, rākṣasa demons, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, or ghosts who are disgusted with ghosts dare to do so.

source_sentence: 若入山陵、溪谷、壙路，抄賊劫掠自然不現，師子、虎狼、熊罷、蛇虺悉自縮藏。
translation: If they enter the mountains, streams, valleys, and roads, thieves and robbers will naturally disappear, and lions, tigers, wolves, bears, mules, and snakes will all shrink back into hiding.

source_sentence: 所以者何？
translation: Why is that?

source_sentence: 諸佛至尊德過須彌，智超江海，慧踰虛空，獨步三界無能及者，十方一切莫不蒙度。」
translation: The buddhas' supreme virtue surpasses Mount Sumeru, their wisdom transcends the river and ocean, and their wisdom transcends space; they can't be matched by anyone in the three realms alone, and all people in the ten directions are libera

source_sentence: 佛說如是，長者善作及天帝釋、諸比丘僧，一切會者，諸天、龍神、阿須倫、世間人，
translation: The Buddha said thus: All the assemblies are for gods, dragons, devas, nāgas, asuras, and humans of the world.

source_sentence: 聞經歡喜，作禮而退。
translation: Rejoicing at the recitation of the sutra, he bowed his head in respect and withdrew.

source_sentence: 佛說八部佛名經
translation: Foshuo fangfu foming jing
